title: Universal Basic Income: Why and How?
description: If you've been paying attention to Andrew Yang's Democratic presidential campaign, you're probably familiar with the concept of universal basic income. On this episode, Kate and Luigi give the economic outlook on how a UBI might work, or not work, and investigate how automation and techno-anxiety are driving the conversation.
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (Chicago Booth Review)
